job_history.work_description: Attended customers with their Medicare RX plans and for Medicare Advantage Plans. Accomplished customer satisfaction with members regarding billing, advising on health and dental benefits, quoting benefits and enrollments.
Provided accurate and appropriate information in response to customer inquiries. Demonstrated mastery of customer service call script within specified timeframes. Improved customer ratings.

Collected customer feedback and made process changes to exceed customer satisfaction goals. Made reasonable procedure exceptions to accommodate unusual customer requests. Provided accurate and appropriate information in response to customer inquiries.
Maintained up-to-date records at all times. Built customer loyalty by placing follow-up calls for customers who reported product issues.

Represented Nationwide as a licensed Customer Service Agent. Performed quotes and changes to auto and home insurance policies. Provided accurate and appropriate information in response to customer inquiries.

Enhanced customer service by interacting with customers and pinpointing their search and needs on the product they were looking for. Boosted sales by offering other choices and taking advantage of the sale for the week.
Helped patients with their everyday activities, including transportation and med administration. Observed and documented patient status and reported patient complaints to the case manager.
Cared for a mentally and physically disabled adult. Positioned client for comfort and to prevent skin pressure problems. Documented client records on daily flow sheets.

education.university: Border Institute of Technology Amarillo College

skills.name: Customer Service
skills.explanation: Over a decade of experience in customer-facing roles, consistently providing accurate and appropriate information to customers, and improving customer satisfaction.

skills.name: Communication
skills.explanation: Proven ability to effectively communicate with customers, colleagues, and management, both verbally and in writing, as demonstrated through various customer service roles.

skills.name: Problem-Solving
skills.explanation: Demonstrated ability to resolve customer complaints and issues, and make reasonable procedure exceptions to accommodate unusual customer requests.

skills.name: Time Management
skills.explanation: Shown ability to manage time effectively, as demonstrated by meeting customer satisfaction goals and improving customer ratings.

skills.name: Teamwork
skills.explanation: Limited evidence of teamwork experience, but has worked in customer-facing roles that require collaboration with colleagues.

skills.name: Healthcare
skills.explanation: Some experience working in healthcare settings, including providing care to patients and documenting patient records.

skills.name: Sales
skills.explanation: Limited experience in sales, but has worked in a retail environment where sales were a key aspect of the role.

skills.name: Interior Design
skills.explanation: Mentioned in education section, but no practical experience or skills demonstrated in the job history or projects.
